text: "Without Me" is a song by American recording artist Halsey. It was released on October 4, 2018, by Capitol Records, as a single from her upcoming album, Manic (2020). The music video for the song was released on October 29, 2018. It is an R&B; and pop song that discusses a breakup with a partner. It features claps, finger snaps, and understated drums. "Without Me" became Halsey's first number-one on the Billboard Hot 100 as a soloist and her second chart-topper overall, after "Closer" with The Chainsmokers in 2016. "Without Me" uses pieces of the song "Cry Me a River" by Justin Timberlake. A remix to the song featuring American rapper Juice Wrld was released on January 9, 2019. == References == Category:2018 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Pop songs
title: Without Me (Halsey song)
